rat.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: an animal that looks like a large mouse with a long tail
rat.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: someone who has been disloyal to you or deceived you
rat.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: But you promised to help us, you rat!
rat.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: if someone rats on you, they tell someone in authority about something wrong that you have done
rat.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: They’ll kill you if they find out you’ve ratted on them!
rat.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: to not do what you had promised to do
rat.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: He accused the government of ratting on its promises to the disabled.
